name: Dress Up Salon: Fashion Model
description:
Dress Up Salon: Fashion Model, Mall Girl Shopping game brings with fancy dresses includes rich mall girl shopping, fashion model dressing and best dresses for women. Enjoy fashion model dressing with latest outfits and new dresses.

Dress Up Salon: Fashion Model, Mall Girl Shopping Features:
1) Really simple and flawless HD graphics game play
2) Realistic game controls are user friendly
3) Complete hair spa salon, shampoo shower, comb, scissor, and straightener
4) Select hair styles according to your dream dresses
5) Prettiest dress collection with stunning hair color combinations
6) Apply lipsticks, mascara, eye color, jewelry, and eye shades on fashion models
7) Dresses, Outfits, necklaces, shoes, hand bags, headbands and hair catcher
8) Patterned dresses designers and patterned headbands ideas
9) Buy your own dresses in the mall girl shopping game
10) Capture screen once you are done styling up your fashion model and share online
